name: Fallout: New Vegas - Old World Blues
name_original: Fallout: New Vegas - Old World Blues
description:
Fallout: New Vegas - Old World Blues is an action-RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Bethesda Softworks. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Fallout: New Vegas - Old World Blues on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
